Original: Ah, this request? Do you see the
travelling merchant in that seat
there? He shall be your client.
[Page]
He wants you to open a [Color:5]treasure box[Color:0]
located in the [Color:5]Valley Spring[Color:0]. You may
receive the key from him [Color:5]directly[Color:0].
[Page]
Be careful as you go, then, and I
shall await your swift return.
Translation: Ah, this request? Do you see the
travelling merchant in that seat
there? He shall be your client.
[Page]
He wants you to open a [Color:5]treasure box[Color:0]
located in the [Color:5]Valley Spring[Color:0]. You may
receive the key from him [Color:5]directly[Color:0].
[Page]
Be careful as you go, then, and I
shall await your swift return.

Original: Thank you for your hard work... I saw
your dealings with him. He forced you
to take that... that filthy armor.
[Page]
Well, think of it as a second reward.
Perhaps selling it at the Atelier will
fetch money enough for a Medica.
[Page]
Here, at least, is the real reward.
I again thank you.
Translation: Thank you for your hard work... I saw
your dealings with him. He forced you
to take that... that filthy armor.
[Page]
Well, think of it as a second reward.
Perhaps selling it at the Atelier will
fetch money enough for a Medica.
[Page]
Here, at least, is the real reward.
I again thank you.

Original: You wander the labyrinth, the sound of
running water in your ears. At last,
you find the treasure box...
[Page]
This is the one you took a request
at the bar to open and retrieve its
contents.
[Page]
At least, that is what you assume, as
this treasure box is locked. You have
the key now, and so...
Translation: You wander the labyrinth, the sound of
running water in your ears. At last,
you find the treasure box...
[Page]
This is the one you took a request
at the bar to open and retrieve its
contents.
[Page]
At least, that is what you assume, as
this treasure box is locked. You have
the key now, and so...

Original: Within the chest, you find a set of
armor so old as to be functionally
worthless.
[Page]
Yet no one can deny that you have
thus fulfilled the request.
[Page]
All that is left now is to deliver
this to [Color:5]Sabert, the merchant[Color:0], who is
waiting for you at the bar.
Translation: Within the chest, you find a set of
armor so old as to be functionally
worthless.
[Page]
Yet no one can deny that you have
thus fulfilled the request.
[Page]
All that is left now is to deliver
this to [Color:5]Sabert, the merchant[Color:0], who is
waiting for you at the bar.

Original: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Valley Spring[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]Your map of the [Color:5]Valley Spring[Color:3] has
been updated.[Color:0]
